headline: ExxonMobil to Release First Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: SPRING, Texas, April 22, 2025--Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE: XOM) will release its first quarter 2025 financial results on Friday, May 2, 2025. The company will issue a press release via Business Wire that will be available at 5:30 a.m. CT at investor.exxonmobil.com.

headline: ExxonMobil Gives Walmart+ Members 50 Cents Off Per Gallon On Fill-Ups For Walmart+ Week
summary: SPRING, Texas - ExxonMobil is offering Walmart+ members extra savings at the pump - to the tune of 50 cents off per gallon. But it doesn't stop there, one lucky Exxon or Mobil branded fuel station...

headline: Here's How You Can Earn $100 In Passive Income By Investing In Exxon Mobil Stock
summary: Exxon Mobil Corp. (NYSE:XOM) engages in the exploration and production of crude oil and natural gas in the U.S. and internationally. It will report its Q1 2025 earnings on May 2. Wall Street analysts expect the company to post EPS of $1.70, down from $2.06 in the prior-year period. According to data from Benzinga Pro, quarterly revenue is expected to be $86.09 billion, up from $83.08 billion a year earlier.
